edge: Sohail Khan played the role of Manav in this movie.
In the movie, Sohail Khan's character was named Amar Khanna.
Isha Koppikar portrayed the character of Disha in this film.
Anita Hassanandani appeared as Shanti (credited as 'Natassha' in the film credits) in this movie.
In the movie, Rati Agnihotri acted as Sunita Menon.
Vrajesh Hirjee appeared as Puneet 'Talli' Kumar in this film.
Divya Palat portrayed the character of Nupur in this movie.
In the movie, June Malia played the role of Disha's friend.
Hiten Tejwani acted as Akshay in this film.
In the movie, Alihassan Turabi appeared as Kabir.
In this movie, Roopa Ganguly portrayed 'The Nun of the church' character.
In this movie, Rajendranath Zutshi played the role of Professor Siddharth Das.
In this movie, Rajendra Gupta acted as J.C. College's Principal.
In this movie, Usha Nadkarni appeared as Disha's mother.
